definition: (conjunction used to express contrast with a previous clause) but/then/standard/norm/principle/to imitate/to follow/classifier for written items
to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]

sentences.english: Presumption is an important proof in modern action, so it should be regulated.
sentences.chinese: 推定是現代訴訟中的一種重要證明方式，應該規則化。
